00104 Set(const std::string &aFileName, bool aUpdateFromXMLNode = true) :
00105     Object(aFileName),

00119 Set(const Set<T> &aSet) :
00120     Object(aSet),
00121     _objects((ArrayPtrs<T>&)_propObjects.getValueObjArray()),

00150 void
00151 setNull()
00152 {
00153     setupProperties();
00154     _objects.setSize(0);
00155     _objectGroups.setSize(0);
00156 }
00157 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00161 void
00162 setupProperties()
00163 {
00164     _propObjects.setName("objects");
00165     _propertySet.append(    &_propObjects );
00166 
00167     _propObjectGroups.setName("groups");
00168     _propertySet.append(    &_propObjectGroups );
00169 }
00170 
00171 public:
00172 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00176 void
00177 setup()
00178 {
00179     int i;
00180     for (i=0; i<_objectGroups.getSize(); i++) {
00181         _objectGroups.get(i)->setup((ArrayPtrs<Object>&)_objects);
00182     }
00183 }

00236 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00237 // OUTPUT (<<)
00238 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00239 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00250 friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &aOut,const Set<T> &aSet)
00251 {
00252     aOut << "Set[" << aSet.getSize() <<"] =";
00253 
00254     int i;
00255     T* obj;
00256     for(i=0;i<aSet.getSize();i++)  {
00257         aOut << " ";
00258         obj = aSet[i];
00259         if(obj==NULL) {
00260             aOut << "NULL";
00261         } else {
00262             aOut << *obj;
00263         }
00264     }
00265 
00266     return(aOut);
00267 }
00268 #endif // SWIG

00464 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00468 void getGroupNamesContaining(const std::string &aObjectName, Array<std::string> &rGroupNames) const
00469 {
00470     rGroupNames.setSize(0);
00471     for(int i=0; i<_objectGroups.getSize(); i++)
00472         if(_objectGroups[i]->contains(aObjectName))
00473             rGroupNames.append(_objectGroups[i]->getName());
00474 }

00525 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00526 // REMOVE
00527 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00528 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00543 virtual bool remove(int aIndex)
00544 {
00545     // remove the object from all of the groups
00546     int i;
00547     for (i=0; i<_objectGroups.getSize(); i++)
00548         _objectGroups.get(i)->remove(_objects.get(aIndex));
00549 
00550     return( _objects.remove(aIndex) );
00551 }
00552 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00564 virtual bool remove(const T* aObject)
00565 {
00566     // remove the object from all of the groups
00567     int i;
00568     for (i=0; i<_objectGroups.getSize(); i++)
00569         _objectGroups.get(i)->remove(aObject);
00570 
00571     return( _objects.remove(aObject) );
00572 }
00573 
00574 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00584 virtual bool replace(int aIndex, T* aObject)
00585 {
00586     if (aObject != NULL && aIndex >= 0 && aIndex < _objects.getSize())
00587     {
00588         for (int i = 0; i < _objectGroups.getSize(); i++)
00589             _objectGroups.get(i)->replace(_objects.get(aIndex), aObject);
00590         _objects.remove(aIndex);
00591         return _objects.insert(aIndex, aObject);
00592     }
00593 
00594     return false;
00595 }
00596 
00597 virtual void clearAndDestroy()
00598 {
00599     _objects.clearAndDestroy();
00600     _objectGroups.clearAndDestroy();
00601 }

00663 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00671 virtual void getNames(OpenSim::Array<std::string> &rNames ) const
00672 {
00673     for(int i=0;i<_objects.getSize();i++) {
00674         T *obj = _objects[i];
00675         if(obj==NULL) {
00676             rNames.append("NULL");
00677         } else {
00678             rNames.append(obj->getName());
00679         }
00680     }
00681 }

00690 {
00691     return( _objects.getLast() );

00748 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00752 void addGroup(const std::string& aGroupName)
00753 {
00754     _objectGroups.append(new ObjectGroup(aGroupName));
00755 }
00756 
00757 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00761 void removeGroup(const std::string& aGroupName)
00762 {
00763     _objectGroups.remove(_objectGroups.get(aGroupName));
00764 }
00765 
00766 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00771 void renameGroup(const std::string& oldGroupName, const std::string& newGroupName)
00772 {
00773     ObjectGroup* grp=_objectGroups.get(oldGroupName);
00774     //TODO This should check for duplicates and throw an exception if duplicate
00775     grp->setName(newGroupName);
00776 }
00777 
00778 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00782 void addObjectToGroup(const std::string& aGroupName, const std::string& aObjectName)
00783 {
00784     ObjectGroup* group = _objectGroups.get(aGroupName);
00785     Object* object = _objects.get(aObjectName);
00786     if (group && object)
00787         group->add(object);
00788 }
00789 
00790 //_____________________________________________________________________________
00794 void getGroupNames(Array<std::string> &rGroupNames) const
00795 {
00796     rGroupNames.setSize(0);
00797     for(int i=0; i<_objectGroups.getSize(); i++)
00798         rGroupNames.append(_objectGroups[i]->getName());
00799 }
00800

00805 const ObjectGroup* getGroup(const std::string& aGroupName) const
00806 {
00807     return _objectGroups.get(aGroupName);
00808 }
